thread.title: MLB rumors: Justin Upton tops list of bats Yankees should target
thread.title_full: MLB rumors: Justin Upton tops list of bats Yankees should target | NJ.com

author: Brendan Kuty | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: MLB rumors: Justin Upton tops list of bats Yankees should target
text:
Yankees general manager Brian Cashman said he could have had utility man Ben Zobrist in a trade with the A's at the deadline . But he turned down their offer of a package that included Rob Refsnyder and Adam Warren.
Will Cashman go after him again?
PLUS | Yankees' final grades: Alex Rodriguez, Brian Cashman get ...
Certainly, there Yankees have a need at second base. If they don't bring somebody else in, they could be looking at a second straight year of platooning at the position. In 2015, Stephen Drew and Brendan Ryan shared most of the reps. Next season, it would be Refsnyder and Dustin Ackley.
But while Zobrist will be on the Yankees' minds, he isn't the only free-agent bat the Yankees should consider.
See our list of potential targets in the gallery above.
